headless.hint: Starts a web server instead of the GUI.

headless-server-port.hint: Port for the web server, if started in headless mode.

update-debs-prerelease.hint: Update Debian packages from the pre-release branch

ros-version.hint: Set ROS version {1, 2}. Sourced from ROS_VERSION by default.

ros-domain-id.hint: Set ROS domain id. Sourced from ROS_DOMAIN_ID by default.

host.hint: If --start is active, the hosts (separated by commas) can be specified here.

join.hint: Joins on start to current ROS domain id

start.hint: If 'join' is set, start the ROS-MAS nodes.
